text: Can you use HubSpot search to search for items in custom module repeater?

if those items are content rendered to a page those values will appear in the page and be indexed.

Think of CMS site search similar to normal search engines.
for more detail on how it works and how you can affect it see <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/content-search>
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Support-the-access-token-via-a-header-in-quot-GET-oauth-v1/m-p/401181> I was able to reply to this
